title: Show HN: A SOTA chart-extraction system combining traditional CV and LVMs
description: Reducto provides high-quality document ingestion for AI teams by accurately parsing complex documents like PDFs, Excel spreadsheets, and PowerPoint slides. Get started for free.
content: This write-up is part of Reductos Applied Research arm, working on the hardest problems in the document processing, OCR, and VLM space. If you want to solve problems like this, were always looking fo… [+11787 chars]
